H0.text: A cloud can be used to represent water cycling through the atmosphere in a drawing of the water cycle.

H1.text: A stream can be used to represent water cycling through the atmosphere in a student's drawing of the water cycle.

H2.text: A frozen lake is an image the student can use to represent water cycling through the atmosphere in a drawing of the water cycle.

H3.text: A drop of dew is an image a student can use to represent water cycling through the atmosphere in a drawing of the water cycle.

A4.text: Condensation: The transformation of water vapor to liquid water droplets in the air, creating clouds and fog.
